resources.string: While holding a finger on your device\'s proximity sensor, press the button below.
WARNING: Calibrating without touching the sensor may cause problems.
IF YOUR CALIBRATION IS CORRECT, PRESS THE BACK ARROW. IF NOT, RE-CALIBRATE.
Check the box to enable Proximity Lock
Check the box to enable an app shortcut in your notification shade
Change the time needed for the proximity sensor to lock your device
Change the sensor value that triggers Proximity Lock
Every Android device is unique, so we need you to calibrate your proximity sensor.
The proximity sensor is usually located next to your device\'s earpiece.
Use this screen to locate your proximity sensor.\n(This is the sensor\'s value in real-time)
While touching the proximity sensor, press the calibrate button.
